designations.source: A review of the scarce and threatened beetles of Great Britain Part 2 (Hyman, P.S. revised and updated by M.S. Parsons.)
designations.source_description: Hyman, P S revised and updated by Parsons, M S.  UK nature conservation, No. 12.  Published by JNCC, 1994.  Along with Part 1, updates relevant information in the RDB Insects (1987) using the old IUCN categories and criteria (pre 1994).
designations.reporting_category: Red Listing based on pre 1994 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: Taxa in danger of extinction and whose survival is unlikely if the causal factors continue operating. Superseded by new IUCN categories in 1994, but still applicable to lists that have not been reviewed since 1994.
